price: "E disse: 'Implorai perdão a vosso Senhor - por certo, Ele é Perdoador' -
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
